title: Mars Transit in the 7th House for Sagittarius Ascendant
summary: When Mars transits the 7th house for Sagittarius Ascendant, energy intensifies within partnerships, marriage, and public dealings. Interactions become direct, assertive, and sometimes confrontational. There is a strong urge to dominate negotiations or push agendas forward, which can strain relationships if patience is lacking. Passion rises in personal bonds, while business alliances demand clear boundaries. When handled maturely, this transit supports decisive collaboration, courageous confrontation of issues, and stronger partnerships built on mutual respect.

sections.title: Core Personality
points: Need to prove strength in dealings

closing: This Mars transit activates partnerships with intensity. With restraint, it forges strong alliances, honest resolution, and balanced cooperation.
